unnormalised: IIT Delhi announced the commencement of its application process for the academic year 2024-25 on 15/05/2024. Prospective students can apply for various postgraduate programs, including M.Tech, MBA, and Ph.D. The deadline for submission of applications is 30/06/2024 at 5:00 PM.
normalised: I-I-T Delhi announced the commencement of its application process for the academic year two thousand and twenty four to twenty five on fifteenth May two thousand and twenty four. Prospective students can apply for various postgraduate programs, including M-Tech, M-B-A, and P-h-D. The deadline for submission of applications is thirtieth June two thousand and twenty four at five zero zero P-M.

unnormalised: The eligibility criteria for the M.Tech programs require a B.Tech degree with a minimum of 75% marks or a CGPA of 7.5 on a scale of 10. For the MBA program, candidates need a bachelor's degree with 60% and a valid CAT score. Detailed information regarding eligibility criteria, application procedure, and available specializations can be found on the institute’s official website, www.iitd.ac.in.
normalised: The eligibility criteria for the M-Tech programs require a B-Tech degree with a minimum of seventy five percent marks or a C-G-P-A of seven point five on a scale of ten. For the M-B-A program, candidates need a bachelor's degree with sixty percent and a valid C-A-T score. Detailed information regarding eligibility criteria, application procedure, and available specializations can be found on the institute’s official website, triple W dot iitd dot ac dot in.

unnormalised: This year, IIT Delhi is offering new specializations in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science to meet the growing industry demand. The institute has also increased the number of seats by 15% in response to the rising number of applications. The application fee is Rs. 500 for general category candidates and Rs. 250 for SC/ST/PwD candidates.
normalised: This year, I-I-T Delhi is offering new specializations in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science to meet the growing industry demand. The institute has also increased the number of seats by fifteen percent in response to the rising number of applications. The application fee is rupees five hundred for general category candidates and rupees two hundred and fifty for S-C slash S-T slash P-w-D candidates.

unnormalised: The admission process includes a written test, followed by an interview for shortlisted candidates. The written test will assess the candidate’s aptitude in relevant subjects and general knowledge. The interview will evaluate their communication skills and overall suitability for the program. The tentative dates for the written test and interview are 10/07/2024 and 20/07/2024 respectively.
normalised: The admission process includes a written test, followed by an interview for shortlisted candidates. The written test will assess the candidate’s aptitude in relevant subjects and general knowledge. The interview will evaluate their communication skills and overall suitability for the program. The tentative dates for the written test and interview are tenth July two thousand and twenty four and twentieth July two thousand and twenty four respectively.

unnormalised: Candidates are advised to carefully read the instructions provided on the website before filling out the application form. In case of any queries, they can contact the admissions office at admissions@iitd.ac.in or call on 011-2659-7135 between 10:00 AM and 5:00 PM on weekdays. Successful candidates will be notified by 15/08/2024.
normalised: Candidates are advised to carefully read the instructions provided on the website before filling out the application form. In case of any queries, they can contact the admissions office at admissions at iitd dot ac dot in or call on zero eleven two six five nine seven one three five between ten zero zero A-M and five zero zero P-M on weekdays. Successful candidates will be notified by fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four.
